magicitem:usage.restrictedWorld: §7[§fMagicItem§7]§r §cMagicItem are not allowed in this world!
magicitem:commands.add.help: §2/mi add <String: itemName> <String: itemId>:§f Add (create) a new MagicItem item
magicitem:commands.give.help: §2/mi give <Player: player> <String: itemName> [Int: count] [Int: quality]:§f Give the specified MagicItem item to the player
magicitem:commands.show.help: §2/mi show:§f Show the item in hand
magicitem:commands.sell.help: §2/mi sell:§f Sell the MagicItem item in the backpack
